articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Consultative Meeting of Officials in Fields of State Security and Foreign Affairs
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Consultative Meeting of Officials in Fields of State Security and Foreign Affairs
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A consultative meeting of officials in the fields of state security and foreign affairs took place as regards the grave situation prevailing in the DPRK. 
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), convened the meeting and guided it. 
					
					Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; Hyon Yong Chol, chief of the General Staff of the KPA; Kim Won Hong, minister of State Security; Pak To Chun and Kim Yong Il, secretaries of the Central Committee of the WPK; Hong Sung Mu, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK; and Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs. 
					
					Kim Jong Un received a report on the new situation and circumstances prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity. 
					
					The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was an exercise of a legitimate right of a sovereign state and it was recognized by even leading special organs of the U.S. However, a grave situation was created on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity due to the unprecedented anti-DPRK moves of the hostile forces which arbitrarily and provocatively fabricated the "resolution" of the UN Security Council on tightening sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					Since April last year the DPRK has made every possible effort to prove the peaceful nature of the satellite launch; it ensured transparency, going beyond international practice, and chose the time when the situation was relatively peaceful for satellite launch, etc. 
					
					However, the hostile forces deliberately denied the DPRK's right to satellite launch in a bid to use it  as a pretext for stifling it. 
					
					The U.S. and its allies took this high-handed hostile action in wanton violation of the sovereign state's independent right to develop space publicly recognized by international law. This indicates that the U.S. has reached its height in its anti-DPRK strategy to stand in confrontation with it to the last out of inveterate repugnancy and enmity towards the ideology and social system chosen by the people in the DPRK. 
					
					This has thrown a grave obstacle to the efforts to be focused by the DPRK on economic construction so that the people may not tighten their belts any longer on the basis of the war deterrence for self-defence provided by leader Kim Jong Il all his life. 
					
					Different countries concerned made efforts to fairly solve the problem and prevent the deterioration of the situation. But, it became clear that there was limit to their ability, as they admitted. This fact proved once again that the DPRK should defend its sovereignty by itself.
					
					It also became clear that there can be no denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula before the world has been denuclearized.
					
					At the consultative meeting Kim Jong Un expressed the firm resolution to take substantial and high-profile important state measures in view of the prevailing situation as the stand had already been clarified by the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK through their statements that powerful physical countermeasures would be taken to defend the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country. He advanced specific tasks to the officials concerned.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Distributed as Official Document at UNSC
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fabricating UN "Resolution" with Foreign Forces
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released the following statement on Friday:
					 There took place another astonishing case. The U.S. and its followers cooked up a "resolution on tightening sanctions" at the UN Security Council by terming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes an inter-continental ballistic missile launch.
					
					 The fabrication of "the resolution" this time represents the height of the hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK as it is the last-ditch efforts of the hostile forces displeased with the ever-increasing authority and national power of the DPRK.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean puppet group of traitors took the lead in fabricating the "resolution".
					
					 When satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 of the DPRK lifted off in December last year, the group desperately took issue with it, talking about "provocation" and "blatant challenge" against the international community. It worked hard to see the UN apply additional "sanctions" against the DPRK, vociferating about "strong counteraction" and "tightened sanctions".
					
					 The minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade and other mandarins of the south Korean regime visited theU.S., Japan and other neighboring countries to discuss "close cooperation at the UN" and asked them for their active participation in the moves for tightening "sanctions against the north". Not content with this, the south Korean group unhesitatingly submitted a "proposal for additional sanctions against the north" to the UN.
					
					 It is the group which clamored for "independent additional sanctions" together with the U.S. and it is again the group which was the first to utter "welcome" and "implementation of the resolution" right after its fabrication at the UNSC.
					
					 The world knows no such hordes of traitors who worked with bloodshot eyes to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces as the south Korean group.
					
					 The row kicked up by the group against the DPRK over its satellite launch is aimed to tarnish its image, save the face of the group that fell to the ground and deliver the anti-DPRK policy from its total bankruptcy.
					
					 The group salvaged wreckages of the DPRK's carrier rocket Unha-3 from waters of the West Sea and was stunned by the high level of its technology.
					
					 As fellow countrymen the group should have been pleased with the great event to be recorded specially in the national history spanning five thousand years, the event which fully demonstrated the dignity and might of the nation. Nevertheless, it behaved so foolishly. This shows it is betenoire bereft of an iota of reason as human beings.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are greatly infuriated by the fabrication of the UN "resolution" by the U.S. and its allies and the group's desperate efforts.
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea vehemently rejects the UN "resolution" in the name of all the fellow countrymen, branding it as an unpardonable grave challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and the Korean people.
					
					 It, at the same time, strongly condemns the reckless behavior of the group taking the lead in faking up the UN "resolution" in league with foreign forces as the most despicable act of treachery and an unbearable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 In view of the prevailing grave situation the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea solemnly declares the following counter-measures against the south Korean puppet group, representing the towering anger and unanimous will of the army and the people of the DPRK and all other Koreans.
					
					1. Now that the south Korean puppet conservative group is more desperately kicking up a racket against the DPRK over its nuclear and missile issues with the U.S., there will be no more discussion on denuclearization between the north and the south in the future.
					
					 In this connection, we declare complete nullification of the "Joint Declaration on Denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula" adopted in 1992 and its total invalidity.
					
					 The joint declaration already proved a dead paper long ago due to the moves of the U.S. and the puppet group for a nuclear war against the north and their nuclear rackets against it. It is needless to say that there is no need for us to be bound to the declaration.
					
					2. As long as the south Korean puppet group of traitors persistently pursues a hostile policy toward the DPRK, we will never negotiate with anyone.
					
					 The historical lesson shows that there is nothing to be solved when meeting with those who pursue confrontation with the DPRK and this will only bedevil the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The group should not think about any dialogue with us as long as it sticks to the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					3. If the puppet group of traitors takes a direct part in the UN "sanctions," the DPRK will take strong physical counter-measures against it.
					
					 "Sanctions" mean a war and a declaration of war against us.
					
					 We have already declared that "we would react to provocation with immediate retaliatory blows and a war of aggression with a great war of justice for national reunification."
					
					 The group would be well advised to stop acting rashly, bearing in mind this warning served by us.
					
					 All our service personnel and people will never allow the reckless confrontation moves of the group.
					
					 Those who dare stand in the way of our just cause will never be able to escape deadly retaliatory blows.

articles.title: Greetings to President of India
articles.content:
Greetings to President of India
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Indian President Pranab Mukherjee on the occasion of the Day of the Republic of India.
					Kim in the message sincerely wished the president of India good health and happiness and his people steady development and prosperity in the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in different fields in the future thanks to the mutual efforts.

articles.title: Congratulations to Governor-General of Australia
articles.content:
Congratulations to Governor-General of Australia
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, in a message on Saturday congratulated Quentin Bryce, governor-general of Australia, on its national day.
					Kim Yong Nam wished Quentin Bryce good health and happiness and the friendly Australian people welfare and prosperity.

articles.title: Reception Given by Indian Charge d' Affaires Ad Interim
articles.content:
Reception Given by Indian Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Rajesh Kumar Aherwar, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Indian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Saturday to mark the Day of the Republic.
					Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: Participants in Meeting of Secretaries of WPK Cells Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in Meeting of Secretaries of WPK Cells Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					They entered the hall where statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il stand, in humblest reverence for them.
					
					They paid profound respects to them.
					
					They entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					They paid homage to him who successfully accomplished the unique cause of party building and energetically led the party cells to grow stronger and raise their roles in every period of the revolutionary development and at its every stage.
					
					They then entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					They paid homage to him, expressing their inmost feelings that thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward and developing the Generalissimos' idea of party building and feats performed by them, the revolutionary cause of the party, the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche is winning victory after victory.
					
					They went round the halls which house orders the Generalissimos received, cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them till the last period of their lives.

articles.title: Participants in Meeting of Secretaries of WPK Cells Visit Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
articles.content:
Participants in Meeting of Secretaries of WPK Cells Visit Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Saturday.
					They placed bunches of flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, before making bows to her.
					
					They also laid a wreath and bouquets on the wreath-laying stand of the cemetery and observed a moment's silence in memory of anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs.

articles.title: Secretaries of WPK Cells Arrive to Attend Their Meeting
articles.content:
Secretaries of WPK Cells Arrive to Attend Their Meeting
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Participants of the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea arrived here by train on Saturday amid great expectation and interest of all party members, service personnel and other people.
					They were warmly greeted by officials of the Central Committee of the WPK and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Encourages Young DPRK People
articles.content:
"Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" Published
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Book "Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in the DPRK.
					 The book was published for the first time on the occasion of the 60th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and its enlarged edition was brought out in Juche 92 (2003).
					
					 The new book has 12 chapters, 96 sections and epilog dealing with immortal revolutionary exploits of the President and his personality as a peerlessly great man.
					
					 The first four chapters cover the period from April 1912 to August 1945. They tell stories that the President pioneered the revolutionary cause of Juche and led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, achieving the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 The next four chapters cover the period from August 1945 to December 1960. They deal with the feats the President performed by successfully implementing the historic tasks for carrying out social revolution at two stages, waging the Fatherland Liberation War, conducting the postwar rehabilitation and construction and laying  foundations of socialism, and establishing the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK.
					
					 The last four chapters cover the period from January 1961 to July 1994. They deal with the immortal feats the President performed by successfully leading socialist construction of various phases and thereby building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence and fully demonstrating its dignity and might.

articles.title: DPRK People Angered at U.N. Resolution
articles.content:
DPRK People Angered by U.N. Resolution
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The UNSC "resolution" against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, adopted on the initiative of the United States, has lashed the local people into fury.
					Such slogan as "Death to the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy of the Korean people" can be heard everywhere in the country.
					
					Many young people are volunteering for military services, out of their will to annihilate the enemies while other people visit military posts with aid materials. 
					
					O Yong Ho, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					"We will counter the U.S. high-handedness and arbitrariness with real action to show the mettle of the Koreans.
					
					The DPRK should promptly stage a nuclear test and continue to launch long-range missiles. If the U.S. persists in its provocative moves, the DPRK should blow up the U.S. mainland through a sacred war for justice.
					
					This is the mindset of all the people in the DPRK as well as the fixed will of the servicepersons."
					
					Kim Tok Jong, an old man living in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					"A nation's sovereignty is more precious than one's life.
					
					Why can't the DPRK only have satellites and launch long-range missiles, though other countries are allowed to do so? I can hardly repress my wrath at such brigandish demand.
					
					I have lived for nearly 70 years. The past years clearly shows that words do not go on the U.S. and only force is needed to settle accounts with it.
					
					If a war breaks out, I will take arms in my hand to fight against the U.S. scoundrels.
					
					I will also do my utmost to wipe out the group of evils running amuck to trample down the nation's right to existence and development."

articles.title: Songun Policy, Key to Defending Peace
articles.content:
Songun Policy, Key to Defending Peace
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Songun (military-first) policy of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a mode of politics that should be constantly maintained as long as the imperialists stick to aggression moves.
					The policy, pursued by leader Kim Jong Il in an all-round way in the 1990s, calls for priority to the military affairs to cope with any aggression moves.
					
					The history teaches a serious lesson that any country with weak military muscle can not but be made a victim of aggression and armed intervention by hostile forces.
					
					It is an invariable principle that a country can defend its sovereignty only with arms.
					
					The United States has long intensified military pressure on the DPRK in a bid to stifle it by dint of force.
					
					Owing to the war exercises staged by the U.S. forces frequently in and around south Korea, a war may break out any moment in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					However, the DPRK with powerful military strength has taken decisive steps to meet the U.S. military threat, demonstrating its dignity and might in every showdown with the U.S.
					
					The practical experience gained by the DPRK people shows that the Songun policy reliably ensures the existence and future of the country and the nation as well as victory in the cause of socialism, the cause of independence of the popular masses.
					
					Peace can be defended only by powerful military strength, not by means of begging and compromise.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Building WPK Praised
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Building WPK Praised
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) will be held in Pyongyang on January 28, Juche 102 (2013).
					On this occasion the Korean people are recalling the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building and strengthening the WPK.
					
					Hong Myong Chol, an official of the primary party committee of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, told KCNA:
					
					"With the day of the meeting approaching, I sorely miss President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who had devoted themselves to developing the WPK into an invincible one.
					
					The WPK is the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. Herein lies the high prestige and dignity the party is enjoying.
					
					The glorious course covered by the WPK and all its feats are unthinkable apart from their august names."
					
					Kim Kwang Ok, a teacher of Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, said:
					
					"The greatness of a party rests with the greatness of its leader.
					
					The ever-victorious history of the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung was creditably carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					In his early days of work at the WPK Central Committee, Kim Jong Il set it as his lifelong mission to develop the party into Kim Il Sung's party.
					
					He had worked heart and soul to turn the WPK into steel-like ranks and a seasoned political organization united under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					That is why the 4th WPK Conference, held in April last year, adopted a decision on holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal WPK general secretary, in representation of the desire of all the party members, servicepersons and other people.
					
					The august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will go down forever along with the history of the WPK."

articles.title: Media Devoid of Objectivity Should Feel Shame
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted Field Tactical Drills
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The First Division of the south Korean puppet army announced it would start field tactical drills in different places of Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Jan. 28, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The war maneuvers will be staged under the simulated conditions of surprise preemptive strike at the DPRK three times till the end of February with huge forces, tanks, automatic artillery pieces and other offensive means involved.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is going reckless with the above-said war maneuvers as part of its moves for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Action to Defend Country's Sovereignty
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Action to Defend Country's Sovereignty
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- It is the unshakable will of the Korean people to frustrate the hostile moves of the U.S. and its allies, dishonest forces against the DPRK and launch an all-out action to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The UNSC should regard impartiality as its life and soul, but it openly adopted its "resolution" in gross violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK by playing into the hands of the U.S.
					
					The U.S. took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch, asserting that a rocket tipped with a satellite becomes a carrier rocket and a rocket tipped with a warhead becomes a missile. The world, however, clearly witnessed satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, not a warhead, accurately put into orbit by carrier rocket Unha-3. This being a stark fact, the U.S. adamantly insists it was a test of a long-range missile launch though it recognized it. It is sadly mistaken if it thinks this brigandish logic will work in this bright world.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will not remain a passive onlooker to the infringement upon the sovereignty of the nation and the supreme interests of the country. Very just is the resolute stand taken by the DPRK under the situation where there exists neither the six-party talks nor the September 19 joint statement as the U.S. took the lead in encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, its allies are supporting it and the UNSC is getting hostile to the DPRK, bereft of impartiality.
					
					The prevailing situation requires the army and people of the DPRK to turn out as one in the all-out action to defend the sovereignty more precious than their lives and shatter the moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK. It also clearly shows to what the DPRK should orient and subordinate the building of an economic giant, conquering of space and bolstering of war deterrent.
					
					The U.S. and its allies should be held wholly responsible for catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their reckless provocations against the DPRK, warns the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Lee Myung Bak Group's Cooperation with Outsiders
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Lee Myung Bak Group's Cooperation with Outsiders
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Cooperating with foreign forces, while antagonizing fellow countrymen would make it impossible to settle the issue of the north-south relations in the common interests of the Korean nation and this behavior would end up stoking distrust and confrontation, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					Recently, the Lee Myung Bak regime conspired with its American and Japanese masters, cooking up a UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. This was the height of its acts of treachery against the Korean nation.
					
					Such behavior of the group was a reckless action against reunification as it stokes distrust and confrontation between compatriots.
					
					The inter-Korean relations that had developed in the idea of "By our nation itself" hit a huge snag as the Lee group has persistently escalated the confrontation with fellow countrymen by making  desperate efforts to tighten the humiliating "alliance" with the U.S.
					
					The Lee group began bringing the inter-Korean ties to a total collapse by closely cooperating with the U.S., pursuant to its "policy towards the north."
					
					The Lee regime has been busy kicking up rackets of military provocations against the DPRK as servants for outside forces in their moves for a war against it, creating an extreme danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The collapse of the inter-Korean ties clearly proves that all fellow countrymen cannot live in peace even a day, much less achieving national reconciliation and unity and the reunification of the country, as long as the Lee group is allowed to be at large because it has stooped to any act of treachery, regarding sycophancy towards the U.S. and dependence on outsiders as the mode of its living. 
					
					The Korean nation will never tolerate the above-said moves of the group, but thoroughly foil them.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Rapped for Its Role in Fabricating UN "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Rapped for Its Role in Fabricating UN "Resolution on Sanctions"
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday term the despicable role played by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in fabricating the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes a politically-motivated provocation to hurt it at any cost in league with foreign forces as it is the most vivid expression of the group's extreme hostility towards fellow countrymen and its wild ambition to invade the DPRK.
					Rodong Sinmun observes in a bylined commentary that the Lee group worked with bloodshot eyes to create an atmosphere of anti-DPRK "sanctions" worldwide, desperately labeling the DPRK's satellite launch "provocation" and "violation".
					
					The group of traitors visited their U.S. and Japanese masters and neighboring countries, leaving no means untried to have the "resolution" adopted. Not content with it, they cried out for "independent additional sanctions", kicking up hysteria.
					
					It is the last-ditch efforts of the group to hurt the dignity of the DPRK by labeling its launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 "illegal," deter the popular mind-set in south Korea from focusing on the DPRK and realize its scenario for invading the DPRK through cooperation with foreign forces. 
					
					The south Korean puppet forces should bear in mind that if they go reckless, while clamoring for the implementation of the UN "resolution on sanctions", the DPRK will take immediate and merciless countermeasures against them.
					
					They would be well advised to behave themselves, clearly mindful that the "sanctions" are bound to lead to a war and their participation in it would be as foolish an act as pricking its own eyes.
					
					Minju Joson says in a bylined commentary: The desperate racket kicked up by the group of traitors over the DPRK's satellite launch is aimed to tarnish its image, save the group's face fallen to the ground and deliver its policy of confrontation with the DPRK from its total fiasco.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the forces following it have endorsed the "resolution" of the UN Security Council on expanding sanctions against the DPRK on Jan. 22. They called the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes the "launch of a long-range missile".
					The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea worked very hard for the adoption of the resolution, a wanton violation of the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean group of traitors had been engaged in anti-DPRK actions even before the launch of the satellite in December last year.
					
					When the DPRK's satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was put into its orbit, the south Korean regime went busy, holding an "emergency security meeting" and operating a "package measure study office".
					
					It increased the number of posts of the puppet army along the forefront areas and tightened watch, creating an atmosphere reminiscent of wartime.
					
					It has worked hard to stifle the DPRK, making such rhetoric as a "violation of resolution", a "provocation" against the international community and an "outright challenge".
					
					It met bosses of U.S. control machinery in south Korea, officials of U.S. State Department and Japanese masters one after another to ask for a stronger measure at the UN Security Council level. It even referred the issue to other countries and implored them to join in the "sanctions" for isolating the north.
					
					When last year passed without seeing this issue settled, the puppet forces, much upset, did mischief, crying out for the earlier passage of the "resolution on sanctions". 
					
					The Lee regime can never flee from the retaliatory blows of the nation though it moves desperately to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and check its just cause.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions"
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea issued a commentary on Jan. 24 denouncing the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch.
					The commentary said:
					
					The UN Security Council adopted a U.S.-backed "resolution on sanctions" over the north's satellite launch on Jan. 22.
					
					This is a wanton violation of the Space Treaty which considers the use of space for peaceful purpose as the right of sovereign states.
					
					Various countries including permanent members of the UNSC launched satellites by the ballistic missile technology. But no country has been slapped with sanctions for this reason.
					
					The commentary strongly denounced various countries including the U.S. and the UNSC for their unilateral stand of accusing the north of the satellite launch and putting sanctions on it.
					
					The commentary noted:
					
					The U.S. is clinging to sanctions against the north, guided by its own one-sided and self-willed standard. This goes to clearly prove that it has no intention to repeal the hostile policy.
					
					The UNSC's persistent racket of "sanctions" against the north will result in further escalating the situation.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Censured by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Censured by S. Korean Organization
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy of south Korea censured the UN Security Council's "resolution" on expanding "sanctions" against the DPRK at its Thursday rally this week.
					Honorary Chairman of the Association for Supporting the Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy Kwon O Hon and others spoke there.
					
					They described the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the north over its satellite launch as a wanton violation of the right to use space for peaceful purposes and an encroachment on the right to mutual equality.
					
					The U.S. and several other countries launch satellites even for military use. The "sanctions" imposed on the north for its launch of the satellite for economic and peaceful purposes remind one of a thief crying "Stop the Thief!", they said.
					
					They deplored the Lee Myung Bak regime joining the racket for imposing "sanctions" on the north where fellow countrymen live, far from feeling proud of the nation with the north's successful launch of the satellite with its own efforts.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in U.S. Denounces UNSC's Unfair Action
articles.content:
Egyptian Figure Calls for Dissolution of "UN Command"
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on Jan. 14 calling for the dissolution of the "UN Command". 
					 The statement vehemently denounced the U.S. recent moves to revive the "UN Command" according to its new defense strategy as dangerous moves to bring the dark clouds of war to the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to revive the "UN Command" in disregard of all the sincere efforts of the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty. Lurking behind this scenario is a sinister intention to transform the "UN Command" into a "multinational forces command" and use it for invading those countries disobedient to the U.S. in contingency. 
					
					 Whether the U.S. dissolves the "UN Command" or not is a touchstone showing whether it stands for world peace or increased constant tension. 
					
					 We supporters to the Korean people's desire for national reunification express full support and solidarity to their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop all the moves to perpetuate Korea's division and meet the just demand of the DPRK without delay. 
						]

Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti newspaper Kuwait Times on January 15 carried a detailed gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					It also carried a photo of Kim Jong Un making the New Year Address.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Switzerland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Switzerland
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Basel on Jan. 19.
					Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					The committee decided to post on its website Kim Jong Il's works and articles praising his exploits and organize diverse events including meeting, seminar and film show in the period from Jan. 20 to Feb. 17.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated by the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan on Jan. 22.
					Ju Yong Il, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Deben sentir verguenza medios de prensa que perdieron objetividad, senala ACNC
articles.content:
Deben sentir verguenza medios de prensa que perdieron objetividad, senala ACNC
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 26 la siguiente informacion: 
					Recientemente, algunas fuerzas hostiles y plumiferos lanzaron una campana intrigante contra la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea inventando hasta el rumor de la "sospecha de operacion". Esta provocacion politica nunca tolerable es un grave crimen de que se debe liquidar las cuentas sin falta.
					
					La realidad volvio a comprobar que los medios de prensa, que tienen la mision de guiar y organizar la verdadera opinion publica, provocaran el arruinamiento de si mismos y causaran graves consecuencias en las relaciones entre los paises si abandonan el principio de objetividad, imparcialidad y exactitud.
					
					Involucrados en la demagogia politica de las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC, algunos medios chinos difundieron una chismografia que calumnio la maxima dignidad de nuestro pais.
					
					La agencia oficial de China, Xinhua, trato de remediar el caso publicando con rapidez un articulo que refuta esa chismografia, hecho que tomamos en consideracion.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, volvemos a advertir solemnemente a los medios conservadores y ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea que no se arrepienten todavia de su gran crimen cometido ante la nacion coreana y se dedican a la tergiversacion de hechos.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo, que toman por su cuestion vital la defensa del lider y el regimen, castigaran implacablemente a los que ofenden la maxima dignidad nacional circulando datos inimaginablemente falsificados, persiguiendolos hasta el ultimo rincon del mundo.

articles.title: Cooperacion con fuerzas extranjeras es causa de ruptura de relaciones N-S: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Cooperacion con fuerzas extranjeras es causa de ruptura de relaciones N-S: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Si coopera con las fuerzas extranjeras hostilizando a la parte connacional, no se puede resolver el problema de relaciones intercoreanas conforme a los intereses comunes de la nacion, por el contrario, se agravaran la desconfianza y la confrontacion. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado este sabado y continua: 
					
					La banda titere surcoreana de Lee Myung Bak estuvo al frente de la fabricacion reciente en la ONU de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contubernio con sus amos norteamericano y japones. 
					
					La colaboracion de ella con las fuerzas extranjeras es un acto anti-reunificacion que agrava la desconfianza y confrontacion entre los connacionales. 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak pretende enfrentarse con la parte connacional fortaleciendo por otra parte la "alianza" con EE.UU., debido a lo cual se vieron seriamente obstaculizadas las relaciones Norte-Sur que se desarrollaban a base del ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					Ella comenzo a romper totalmente las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas cooperando estrechamente con EE.UU. en el cumplimiento de su "politica sobre el Norte". 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos crearon ademas el extremado peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana recurriendo a la provocacion militar contra la RPDC siendo lacayos de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					La situacion catastrofica de las actuales relaciones intercoreanas muestra claramente que sin castigar implacablemente a los traidores como la banda de Lee Myung Bak que toma por su modo de existencia el servilismo proyanqui y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras y son capaces de cualquier acto traicionero, la nacion coreana no puede vivir en paz ni un dia ni mucho menos lograr la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales ni la reunificacion del pais. 
					
					La nacion coreana frustrara tajantemente las maniobras de los titere surcoreanos que llevan a la fase irremediable las relaciones intercoreanas en cooperacion con las fuerzas extranjeras con el fin de provocar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Periodicos denuncian a la banda de Lee Myung Bak en el tema de "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Periodicos denuncian a la banda de Lee Myung Bak en el tema de "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Los periodicos coreanos publicaron este sabado los comentarios individuales calificando la complicidad de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak en la fabricacion de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de la ONU de una muestra coherente de la extremada hostilidad a la RPDC y ambicion de agredirla y de la peor provocacion politica. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la banda traidora surcoreana hizo todo lo posible para crear el ambiente de "sancion" internacional anti-RPDC calificando el lanzamiento del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" de "acto provocador" y "violacion". 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos visitaron a sus amos norteamericano y japones y otros paises vecinos para que se aprobara la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC en la ONU. Para colmo, preconizan la "sancion adicional independiente". 
					
					Esto parte de su siniestra intencion de manchar la dignidad de la RPDC estigmatizando de "ilegal" el lanzamiento de la unidad no.2 de "Kwangmyongsong-3".
					
					De esa manera, quieren frenar la crecida de los surcoreanos simpatizantes con la RPDC y realizar su ambicion de agredir a esta en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben tener presente que se tomaran contramedidas inmediatas y despiadadas en el caso de que actuen imprudentemente hablando de la ejecucion de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC. 
					
					La "sancion" traera solo la guerra. 
					
					El periodico Minju Joson revela a su vez que la banda surcoreana cuestiona el lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong-3" para manchar la imagen de la RPDC y mantener su politica conflictiva con esta parte connacional, condenada al fracaso total.
